Name: core
Description: Data that Members shall exchange on a free and unrestricted basis to underpin the services they provide for the protection of life and property and for the well-being of all nations

Name: recommended
Description: Data that should also be exchanged by Members to support Earth system monitoring and prediction efforts. Conditions may be placed on the use of recommended data

Name: other
Description: Data identified for global distribution via WIS that is not covered by WMO Unified Data Policy. Conditions may apply
